id: Simple Starter Notion for ADHD Dashboard (2025)
name: Simple Starter Notion for ADHD Dashboard (2025)
description: The contents of this template are also included in my main Notion template, Your ADHD Mynd. What's Included: A simple dashboard Template with a task manager, resource library, and habit tracker. A mobile access page so you can capture ideas, to-dos, and view your grocery lists easily on the Notion mobile app. PLUS! Recently updated to have 2025 Notion functionality and buttons for a better user experience. Template Preview:
